doc: Peter Dinklage https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Dinklage 1 Peter Hayden Dinklage (; born June 11, 1969) is an American actor and film producer. Dinklage studied acting at Bennington College, starring in a number of amateur stage productions. His film debut was in Living in Oblivion (1995) and his breakthrough came with the comedy-drama The Station Agent (2003). He has since appeared in Elf (2003), Find Me Guilty (2006), Underdog (2007), Penelope (2008), Death at a Funeral (2007), The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian (2008), X-Men: Days of Future Past (2014) and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri (2017), which earned him his first Screen Actors Guild Award. In 2018, he appeared as Eitri in the Marvel Cinematic Universe film Avengers: Infinity War and Hervé Villechaize in the biopic film My Dinner with Hervé. Since shooting the pilot episode in 2009, Dinklage has portrayed Tyrion Lannister on the HBO television series Game of Thrones, for which he won three Primetime Emmys from seven consecutive nominations. He also received a Golden Globe for the role in 2012. Peter_Hayden_Dinklage ( ; born June_11_,_1969 ) is an_American_actor_and_film_producer . Dinklage studied_acting at Bennington_College , starring in a_number of amateur_stage_productions . His_film_debut was in Living in Oblivion_(_1995_) and his_breakthrough came with the_comedy-drama The_Station_Agent_(_2003_) . He has_since_appeared in Elf_(_2003_) , Find Me Guilty (_2006_) , Underdog_(_2007_) , Penelope_(_2008_) , Death at a_Funeral_(_2007_) , The_Chronicles of Narnia : Prince_Caspian_(_2008_)_,_X-Men : Days of Future_Past_(_2014_) and Three_Billboards Outside_Ebbing , Missouri_(_2017_) , which earned him his_first_Screen_Actors_Guild_Award . In 2018 , he appeared as Eitri in the_Marvel_Cinematic_Universe_film_Avengers : Infinity_War and Hervé_Villechaize in the_biopic_film My_Dinner with Hervé . Since shooting the_pilot_episode in 2009 , Dinklage has_portrayed Tyrion_Lannister on the_HBO_television_series_Game of Thrones , for which he won three_Primetime_Emmys from seven_consecutive_nominations . He also received a_Golden_Globe for the_role in 2012 . film producer . {PERSON[Dinklage]} studied acting at {ORGANIZATION[Bennington_College]} , starring in a number of amateur stage productions . His film debut was in Living in Oblivion ( 1995 ) and his breakthrough came with the comedy-drama The Station Agent ( 2003 ) . He has since appeared in Elf ( 2003 ) , Find Me Guilty ( 2006 ) , Underdog ( 2007 ) , {PERSON[Penelope]} ( 2008 ) , Death at a Funeral ( 2007 ) , The Chronicles of Narnia : Prince Caspian ( 2008 ) , X-Men : Days of Future Past ( 2014 ) and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing , {LOCATION[Missouri]} ( 2017 ) , which earned him his first Screen Actors Guild Award . In 2018 , he appeared as {PERSON[Eitri]} in the Marvel Cinematic Universe film Avengers : Infinity War and {PERSON[Hervé_Villechaize]} in the biopic film My Dinner with {PERSON[Hervé]} . Since shooting the pilot episode in 2009 , {PERSON[Dinklage]} has portrayed Tyrion Lannister on the {ORGANIZATION[HBO]} television series Game of Thrones , for which he won three Primetime Emmys from seven consecutive nominations . He also received a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} for the role in 2012 . {PERSON[Peter_Hayden_Dinklage]} ( ; born June 11 , 1969 ) is an {MISC[American]} actor and film producer . {PERSON[Dinklage]} studied acting at {LOCATION[Bennington_College]} , starring in a number of amateur stage productions . His film debut was in Living in Oblivion ( 1995 ) and his breakthrough came with the comedy-drama The {ORGANIZATION[Station_Agent]} ( 2003 ) . He has since appeared in {LOCATION[Elf]} ( 2003 ) , Find Me Guilty ( 2006 ) , {PERSON[Underdog]} ( 2007 ) , {PERSON[Penelope]} ( 2008 ) , Death at a Funeral ( 2007 ) , {LOCATION[The_Chronicles_of_Narnia]} : {PERSON[Prince_Caspian]} ( 2008 ) , X-Men : {ORGANIZATION[Days_of_Future_Past]} ( 2014 ) and Three {MISC[Billboards_Outside_Ebbing]} , {LOCATION[Missouri]} ( 2017 ) , which earned him his first {ORGANIZATION[Screen_Actors_Guild_Award]} . In 2018 , he appeared as {PERSON[Eitri]} in the {MISC[Marvel_Cinematic_Universe]} film Avengers : {ORGANIZATION[Infinity_War]} and {PERSON[Hervé_Villechaize]} in the biopic film My {ORGANIZATION[Dinner]} with {PERSON[Hervé]} . Since shooting the pilot episode in 2009 , {PERSON[Dinklage]} has portrayed {PERSON[Tyrion_Lannister]} on the {ORGANIZATION[HBO]} television series {ORGANIZATION[Game_of_Thrones]} , for which he won three {MISC[Primetime_Emmys]} from seven consecutive nominations . He also received a {MISC[Golden_Globe]} for the role in 2012 . {PERSON[Peter_Hayden_Dinklage]} ( ; born {DATE[June_11_,_1969]} ) is an American actor and film producer . Dinklage studied acting at {LOCATION[Bennington_College]} , starring in a number of amateur stage productions . His film debut was in Living in Oblivion ( {DATE[1995]} ) and his breakthrough came with the comedy-drama The Station Agent ( 2003 ) . He has since appeared in Elf ( {DATE[2003]} ) , Find Me Guilty ( 2006 ) , Underdog ( 2007 ) , {PERSON[Penelope]} ( 2008 ) , Death at a Funeral ( {DATE[2007]} ) , The Chronicles of Narnia : Prince Caspian ( {DATE[2008]} ) , X-Men : Days of Future Past ( 2014 ) and Three Billboards Outside Ebbing , {LOCATION[Missouri]} ( {DATE[2017]} ) , which earned him his first Screen Actors Guild Award . In {DATE[2018]} , he appeared as Eitri in the {ORGANIZATION[Marvel_Cinematic_Universe]} film Avengers : {ORGANIZATION[Infinity]} War and {PERSON[Hervé_Villechaize]} in the biopic film My Dinner with {ORGANIZATION[Hervé]} . Since shooting the pilot episode in {DATE[2009]} , {PERSON[Dinklage]} has portrayed Tyrion Lannister on the {ORGANIZATION[HBO]} television series Game of Thrones , for which he won three Primetime Emmys from seven consecutive nominations . He also received a {ORGANIZATION[Golden_Globe]} for the role in {DATE[2012]} .
